column4: on http://members.ij.net/mrmazda/auth/Font/fonts-comps-dejavu.html are sans mono oblique and sans mono bold oblique identical for you?

here FF gets it wrong, and Konq gets it right
here FF 1.0.7 makes both non-bold, FF 1.5 makes both bold, and Konq gets it right (one normal, other bold)
my chat client blocks private messages
not without a restart that will loose my scrollbacks in 15 channels
I focus on the web's impact on people with presbyopia
private message blocking prevents the common problem of /msg spammers overloading me with junk tabs
